task.title: How to Use the UF-80ST Samsung Digital Presenter

context.p: The UF-80ST Samsung Digital Presenter, also known as the document projector, can be an extremely useful tool if you want to project certain documents, books, or objects to your audience. Since it is already plugged in to the computer in Shanks, it will be fairly simple to use.

step.cmd: Lower the projector screen. Instructions found in "How to Lower the Projector Screen."
Turn on the document projector by pressing the power button.
Place your object on the document plate.
Adjust the head of the projector to put your object into view.
Turn on the projector's lamp by pressing the "lamp" button. If the lamp helps, keep it on. If the lamp light does not help, press the "lamp" button again to turn it off.
Press the "AF" button to auto-focus your object.

info.note: Your object should be clearly projected on the screen right now. If it is still not clear or bright enough, refer to the "troubleshooting" section.
